name: Wind Pegasus @Ignister
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
During your Main Phase: You can destroy any number of Spell/Traps your opponent controls, up to the number of "@Ignister" monsters you control. If this card is on your field or in your GY, and another card you control is destroyed by battle, or by an opponent's card effect: You can banish this card, then target 1 card your opponent controls; shuffle it into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Wind Pegasus @Ignister" once per turn.
